import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import{Row, Col, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Product from '../components/Product' import Carousel from '../components/Carousel' import {listProducts} from '../actions/productActions' const HomeScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) const {loading, error, products} = productList useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProducts()) },[dispatch]) return ( <>
